title: Synthetic cation channel: reconstructing the ion permeation pathway of TRPA1 in an artificial system
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26933-26937
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05676K, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Pengyang Xin, Wenke Ren, Qiuhui Zhu, Jie Wang, Yonghui Sun, Junbiao Chang, Gongming Zhu
The carboxyl-modified ion permeation pathway in TRPA1 channel protein was reconstructed in an artificial system. The transport activity of this artificial channel is tunable via external pH due to the carboxyl groups in the ion permeation pathway.
